document_data.caption: Nadul's sketch of the vehicle.
document_data.name: Underwater Boat
document_data.creator: [[Nadul DaRoni]]
document_data.mainbody: dul's device was a sealed one-person boat equipped with [[paddlewheel]]s and a flipper and was slowly propelled by the pilot's hand-pedaling. It contained enough air for the pilot to breathe for at least ten or more minutes, depending on how well they controlled their breathing, and a set of releasable [[sandbag]]s for ballast allowed the vehicle to surface from the depths (so long as it wasn't carrying more than {{SI|220|lb|k|long=yes}} of passenger). Aside from the possibility of leaks, the vehicle was quite reliable and safe, especially compared to other inventions like the [[furnace wagon]] or [[heartland flier]].
document_data.Description: Nadul's device was a sealed one-person boat equipped with [[paddlewheel]]s and a flipper and was slowly propelled by the pilot's hand-pedaling. It contained enough air for the pilot to breathe for at least ten or more minutes, depending on how well they controlled their breathing, and a set of releasable [[sandbag]]s for ballast allowed the vehicle to surface from the depths (so long as it wasn't carrying more than {{SI|220|lb|k|long=yes}} of passenger). Aside from the possibility of leaks, the vehicle was quite reliable and safe, especially compared to other inventions like the [[furnace wagon]] or [[heartland flier]].
document_data.Availability: ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' offered the boat built by Nadul DaRoni.
